amendment.description: To require that certain funds are used for correctional purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 763 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 763 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S5743; text: CR S5743) To require that certain funds are used for correctional purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 763 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 763 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
